headline: Tide Evo Launch Tests Procter And Gamble Growth And Sustainability Story
summary: Procter & Gamble (NYSE:PG) has launched Tide evo, a waterless detergent tile, as part of a nationwide rollout. The product is highly concentrated, designed to work in cold water, and aims to reduce packaging waste. Tide evo represents a new laundry format that Procter & Gamble reports took a decade to develop. For you as an investor, Tide evo sits at the intersection of household staples and rising interest in lower impact consumer products. Procter & Gamble is a major player in fabric and...
